item.title: 印度在汽车关税问题上挑战美国，贸易立场趋于强硬
item.description: 印度周二正式就美国提高汽车关税问题向世界贸易组织提出质疑，表明这个南亚国家在贸易谈判中的立场更加强硬，即使两国正在为在 7 月前达成一项临时协议而努力。【原文：India on Tuesday formally challenged the US on higher auto tariffs by raising the matter with the World Trade Organization, signaling a hardening of the South Asian nation’s stance on trade talks even as the two countries race to clinch an interim deal before July.】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省合作伙伴公司称，美国的困境引发人们转向欧洲和更安全的行业
item.description: BC Partners 欧洲公司董事长尼科斯-斯塔索普洛斯（Nikos Stathopoulos）表示，由于动荡局势拖累了私人市场和交易，投资者正被吸引到服务业和其他更易受全球关税影响的行业。【原文：Investors are being drawn to services and other sectors that are more immune to global tariffs, as volatility weighs down private markets and dealmaking, according to BC Partners Europe Chairman Nikos Stathopoulos.】

item.title: 埃及通胀加速，央行正考虑进一步削减开支
item.description: 埃及通胀率连续第三个月加速上升，超出预期，这可能会使央行在延长货币宽松周期时更加谨慎。【原文：Egyptian inflation accelerated for a third month, exceeding estimates and potentially making the central bank more cautious in extending a monetary-easing cycle.】

item.title: 李明博的财政支出计划令韩国债券承压
item.description: 随着人们越来越担心韩国左翼新总统将开创一个伴随着政府债务上升的财政扩张时代，韩国债券正面临着更艰难的时期。【原文：South Korean bonds are facing tougher times ahead, as concerns grow that the country’s left-leaning new president will usher in an era of fiscal expansion accompanied by rising government debt.】

item.title: 海尔金融为未评级中国企业获得首笔 Samurai 贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，海尔金融服务公司（Haier Financial Services Co.【原文：Haier Financial Services Co. is adding to a surge of interest in Samurai loans with a ¥29.9 billion ($208 million) deal, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the first such financing for an unrated Chinese borrower.】

item.title: 沙特银行疯狂举债以继续为巨型项目提供资金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的银行正急于发行高风险债务，因为沙特王国正在努力应对建设未来主义新城和举办全球体育赛事的庞大开支需求。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s banks are rushing to issue risky debt as the kingdom grapples with the mammoth spending demands of building a futuristic new city and hosting global sporting events.】

item.title: 欧洲 T+1 转型的成本预计高于美国
item.description: 与美国相比，欧洲向更快结算机制过渡的成本可能会更高，因为该地区复杂的市场基础设施需要更庞大的团队来指导这一过程。【原文：Europe’s transition to a faster settlement regime will likely be more expensive than in the US, as the region’s complex market infrastructure requires larger teams to steer the process.】

item.title: 投资者对欧洲的新发现之爱主导了超级回报
item.description: 投资者对欧洲的热情正在成为今年柏林超级回报私人资本会议的主旋律之一。【原文：Investor enthusiasm toward Europe is emerging as one of the dominant themes at this year’s SuperReturn private capital conference in Berlin.】

item.title: 欧元区私营部门5月无视关税略有增长
item.description: 欧元区私营部门 5 月份略有增长，对美国反复无常的贸易政策所造成的不确定性的抵御能力仍比最初估计的要强。【原文：The euro area’s private sector grew slightly in May, remaining more resilient than initially estimated to the uncertainty created by erratic US trade policies.】

item.title: 中国债务市场迎来首次借款人--哈萨克斯坦石油巨头
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦国有石油生产商KazMunayGas National Co.首席执行官表示，该公司正在探索包括人民币债券在内的各种方案，作为从国外筹集资金的一种更便宜的方式。【原文：Kazakhstan’s state-owned oil producer KazMunayGas National Co. is exploring options including yuan-denominated bonds as a cheaper way to raise funds from abroad, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 全球股市因对经济复苏持乐观态度而创下历史新高
item.description: 由于美国经济复苏的迹象盖过了贸易谈判的不确定性，全球股市自 2 月份以来首次创下历史新高。【原文：Global equities hit an all-time peak for the first time since February as signs of a resilient US economy overshadowed uncertainty around trade negotiations.】

item.title: 印尼财富基金称雷-达里奥将担任非正式顾问
item.description: 印度尼西亚达纳塔拉公司（Danantara）表示，雷-达里奥将担任该财富基金领导层和总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的非正式顾问。【原文：Indonesia’s Danantara said Ray Dalio will serve as an informal adviser to the wealth fund’s leadership and President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的 IRH 买下刚果 Alphamin 锡矿联合企业的控制权
item.description: 阿布扎比国际资源控股公司（International Resources Holding）同意收购阿尔法明资源公司（Alphamin Resources Corp.【原文：Abu Dhabi’s International Resources Holding agreed to acquire a majority stake in Alphamin Resources Corp., gaining access to one of the world’s biggest tin mines.】

item.title: 普京的战争经济一路高歌猛进，俄罗斯其他地区却举步维艰
item.description: 随着与弗拉基米尔-普京总统入侵乌克兰有关的企业蓬勃发展，俄罗斯双轨制经济的裂痕正变得越来越大，而其他企业则在为资源而挣扎。【原文：The rift in Russia’s two-track economy is becoming wider as businesses tied to President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine thrive and the rest are struggling for resources.】

item.title: 钢铁关税暂缓后，特朗普给英国五周期限
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普免于对英国出口的钢铁和铝产品加倍征收现有关税之后，英国面临着与美国敲定贸易协定的新的五周最后期限。【原文：The UK is contending with a new five-week deadline to finalize its trade agreement with the US after President Donald Trump spared the country’s steel and aluminum exports from a doubling of existing tariffs.】

item.title: 挪威海产品出口因三文鱼退潮而中断10个月连增势头
item.description: 5月份三文鱼价格下滑，导致挪威海产品出口量在连续10个月增长后首次出现年度下降，原因是粉红瓤鱼的产量有所增加。【原文：A slump in salmon prices in May contributed to the first annual drop in Norwegian seafood exports after 10 months of growth as production of the pink-fleshed fish rose.】

item.title: 银行家和经济学家角逐泰国银行行长职位
item.description: 泰国银行行长一职的竞争日趋白热化，多位银行家和经济学家在周三截止日期前提出申请，希望在东南亚第二大经济体中担任关键角色。【原文：The race to be Bank of Thailand governor is heating up, with multiple bankers and economists applying ahead of Wednesday’s deadline for a pivotal role in Southeast Asia’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望实现第四天上涨
据说 Miniso 将聘请摩根大通和瑞银参与顶级玩具在香港的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美尼索集团控股有限公司（Miniso Group Holding Ltd.）已聘请摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Miniso Group Holding Ltd. has hired JPMorgan Chase & Co. and UBS Group AG for the planned initial public offering of unit Top Toy in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 尽管政府大力推动，日本生育率仍创新低
item.description: 2024 年，日本的生育率连续第九年下降，再创历史新低，这凸显了日本政府在试图扭转世界上老龄化最严重的社会之一的生育趋势时所面临的巨大挑战。【原文：Japan’s fertility rate declined in 2024 for the ninth consecutive year, reaching another historical low that underscores the immense challenge facing the government as it attempts to reverse the trend in one of the world’s most aged societies.】

item.title: 人工智能新贵 Manus 启动文本到视频服务，与 OpenAI 抗衡
item.description: Manus 推出了文字视频生成功能，进入了一个竞争激烈的领域，竞争对手包括 OpenAI、中国的阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和腾讯控股有限公司。【原文：Manus unveiled a text-to-video generation feature, entering a competitive segment populated by rivals from OpenAI to China’s Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Tencent Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 贸易专家称特朗普和习近平在稀土问题上有分歧
item.description: 一位关键矿产政策专家表示，美国和中国似乎对上个月在日内瓦举行的稀土贸易谈判上达成的协议有不同的理解。【原文：The US and China appear to have different understandings of what was agreed on rare earths at last month’s trade talks in Geneva, according to an expert on critical minerals policy.】

item.title: 新西兰全黑橄榄球队签约 Gallagher 保险公司为赞助商
item.description: 新西兰橄榄球队（New Zealand Rugby）与盖拉格保险公司（Gallagher Insurance）达成赞助协议，盖拉格保险公司将获得全黑橄榄球队比赛服的冠名权。【原文：New Zealand Rugby agreed a sponsorship deal with Gallagher Insurance that will give the US-based insurance brokerage naming rights on the playing kit of the All Blacks rugby team.】

item.title: 香港股市出现多年来最激动人心的行情
item.description: 香港的股票资本市场出现了数年来最活跃的时期，数十亿美元的交易提振了市场情绪，并激发了人们对未来更多交易的期待。【原文：Hong Kong’s equity capital markets are seeing the most action in years, with multibillion dollar deals lifting the mood and fueling anticipation about more deals to come.】

item.title: 韩国总统李在镕就任伊始誓言解决经济问题
item.description: 韩国新当选总统李在明就职时承诺，将重振受关税打击的韩国经济，并寻求与朝鲜对话，以缓和朝鲜半岛的紧张局势。【原文：South Korea’s newly elected President Lee Jae-myung took office with a pledge to revive the nation’s tariff-hit economy and seek dialogue with North Korea to diffuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula.】

item.title: 拉加德的欧洲央行未来在世界经济论坛的职位猜测之后备受关注
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）即将就其继续领导欧洲中央银行的承诺接受审查，尤其是在她即将达到 "几乎控制住了通货膨胀 "这一里程碑的时候。【原文：Christine Lagarde is about to face scrutiny on her commitment to keep leading the European Central Bank, not least as she nears the milestone of having just about tamed inflation.】

item.title: 波兰将维持利率不变，关注格拉平斯基的态度
item.description: 波兰将继续维持利率不变，投资者将重点关注央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）在关键的总统选举之后对借贷成本的展望。【原文：Poland is set to keep interest rates on hold, with investors focusing on central bank Governor Adam Glapinski’s outlook for borrowing costs following a pivotal presidential election.】

item.title: 市场等待习近平与特朗普通话，中国债券期货交易减少
item.description: 由于与美国的关税争端持续不断，交易商暂缓在市场上下注，中国长期主权债券期货的交易正在降温。【原文：Transactions in China’s long-term sovereign bond futures are cooling as traders hold off making bets in the market given continued tariff disputes with the US.】

item.title: 越南下令采取行动避免电力紧张，因为高温提升了需求
item.description: 越南总理范明正下令政府机构确保为家庭和企业提供不间断的电力供应，因为热浪使电力需求达到创纪录的水平。【原文：Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh has ordered government agencies to ensure uninterrupted power supplies for households and businesses as heat waves boost electricity demand to a record.】

item.title: 伊朗输往中国的石油数量因制裁和炼油厂检修而减少
item.description: 随着制裁的加强，欧佩克产油国的石油运输受阻，世界最大的化石燃料进口国炼油厂的需求下降，伊朗运往中国的石油正在减少。【原文：Iran is shipping less oil to China, as toughening sanctions snarl the OPEC producer’s shipments and refinery demand falls in the world’s biggest fossil fuel importer.】
